citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1307-1337 on
08/11/2015.
Inspector knocked on the door, called out and honked the horn. No answer was received.
